page.title: 01THE HEDON AREA
page.content: Our block includes the town of{Hedon,} a small village called{Paull}and an industrial complex at{Saltend.}The rest of the area is farmland. The centre of{Hedon}is very old but on the outskirts there are several new housing estates.{Hedon}was a new town in the Middle Ages,but 100 years later it was a flourishing market town and port.The name{Hedon}probably comes from{Heah-dun}which means an uncultivated hill. The street names are interesting too and tell us about early trades and crafts.The earls of Albermarle started the port in{Hedon}in the 12th century when ships were able to travel up the Haven.Later,trade was lost to the port of Wyke,later called{Hull}so by the time{Hedon}got its charter in 1348,very few ships used the port.
